response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and functionality, it's worth more than $100 to anyone looking for something exceptional. Considering its true value, I'm offering it to you for $110. This is a great opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a price slightly above its minimum value, ensuring both parties benefit. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.", "product_price": 110}
